original: intros L1 L2 p H1 H2. intros H3 H4. intros. induction H2. - apply in_app_iff in H4. destruct H4. + apply redacc_cb in H. destruct H as [r [H5 H6]]. exists r. split. * apply in_or_app. left. apply H5. * split. -- apply H6. -- apply H1. + apply IHin. apply H. - apply in_app_iff in H4. destruct H4. + apply red_gen_in in H. destruct H as [r [H5 H6]]. exists r. split. * apply in_or_app. left. apply H5. * split. -- apply H6. -- apply H1. + apply IHin. apply H.
